name: cspace-client
description: CollectionSpace client for browsers and Node.js
author: Ray Lee <rhlee@berkeley.edu>

scripts.coverage: istanbul report --root coverage text && istanbul report --root coverage lcov
scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.test-specs: npm run test-node-specs && npm run test-browser-specs
scripts.test-integration: npm run test-node-integration && npm run test-browser-integration
scripts.test-node: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive test
scripts.test-node-specs: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive test/specs
scripts.test-node-integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive test/integration
